title: Dissociation mechanism of lithium salt by BaTiO3 with spontaneous polarization
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3797-3806
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00798K, Paper
Shaoke Guo, Shendong Tan, Jiabin Ma, Likun Chen, Ke Yang, Qiannan Zhu, Yuetao Ma, Peiran Shi, Yinping Wei, Xufei An, Qingkang Ren, Yanfei Huang, Yingman Zhu, Ye Cheng, Wei Lv, Tingzheng Hou, Ming Liu, Yan-Bing He, Quan-Hong Yang, Feiyu Kang
We elucidate the dissociation mechanism of LiFSI induced by the ferroelectric fillers of BaTiO3 and enhanced spontaneous polarization by oxygen vacancy defects.
